bibl.title: Excavation and Restoration by the SCA Islamic Section at the Northern Church Complex of Tall al-Makhzan (Season Spring 2003).
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.note: Discovery of a small church at the northern side of the church complex. - Observations on the newly excavated rooms along the northern wall.
bibl.seg: AL-TAHER Refaad, Mohammed ABD AL-HAFIZ and Peter GROSSMANN, Excavation and Restoration by the SCA Islamic Section at the Northern Church Complex of Tall al-Makhzan (Season Spring 2003).
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 43 (2004) pp. 89-94, 3 plans et pll. XIII-XV.
